title: General Factoring Procedure
text: When given a trinomial in the form $$x^2+bx+c$$, we must find two numbers (m and n) that multiply to c and add to $$b$$. The factored solution is $$\left(x+m\right) \left(x+n\right)$$.
speech: When given a trinomial in the form  x squared plus b x plus c , we must find two numbers (m and n) that multiply to c and add to  b . The factored solution is  parentheses x plus m,  times, parentheses x plus n,  .
pacedSpeech: When given a trinomial in the form   x squared plus b x plus c
, we must find two numbers (m and n) that multiply to c and add to   b
. The factored solution is    x plus m,  times,  x plus n,

title: Finding $$m$$ and $$n$$
text: $$c=101$$, and $$b=100$$. $$m=100$$ and $$m=1$$ multiply to c and add to $$b$$. So, our solution is $$\left(x+100\right) \left(x+1\right)$$.
speech: c is equal to 101 , and  b, is equal to 100 .  m, is equal to 100  and  m, is equal to 1  multiply to c and add to  b . So, our solution is  parentheses x plus 100,  times, parentheses x plus 1,  .
